name: part_007
file: tmp_【#ぺこーら24SpecialLive】3D LIVE!!!! 最後は歌って踊って盛り上がるぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [1J1JG99KKCk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Usada Pekora announces a medley of her original songs.

subtitles.original: ほら、他にもオリソンがね、ありますぺこですよね。
subtitles.english: Look, there are other original songs too, right?

subtitles.original: 何曲あるか覚えてますか？ 何曲あるか。
subtitles.english: Do you remember how many there are? How many...

subtitles.original: これから、兎田ぺこらオリソンメドレーを最後に披露したいなと思います！
subtitles.english: Now, to finish off, I'd like to perform the Usada Pekora Original Song Medley!

subtitles.original: 最後までみんな、ちゃんと聞いとけぺこだよ。
subtitles.english: Everyone, make sure you listen well until the very end.

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、準備してきます！バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Well then, I'm going to go get ready! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original:
ぺこらんだむぶれいん！
作詞 畑 亜貴 作曲 俊龍
subtitles.english:
Pekorandaumurein!
Lyrics: Aki Hata, Music: Shunryu

subtitles.original: らんだむぶれいんわおっ
subtitles.english: Random Brain, wow!

subtitles.original: 叫んじゃえわおっ
subtitles.english: Let's scream it out, wow!

subtitles.original: 事件だ
subtitles.english: It's an incident!

subtitles.original: 毎日大変
subtitles.english: Every day is a struggle!

subtitles.original: 大成功のタネだと
subtitles.english: As the seeds of great success...

subtitles.original: 笑えない 泣いちゃうな 笑え！
subtitles.english: Can't laugh, don't cry, just laugh!

subtitles.original: ぺこらっ ぷにんぷにんぷにんと
subtitles.english: Pekora, punin punin punin...

subtitles.original: ぺこっ ぺんっ だむしちゃえだまえ
subtitles.english: Peko, pen, damushichae-damae

subtitles.original: NO NO NO の指令 無視返せそりゃ
subtitles.english: No, no, no orders, just ignore them and give them back!

subtitles.original: NO NO NO の指令 らんだむだ Random! Random!
subtitles.english: No, no, no orders, it's random! Random! Random!

subtitles.original: NO NO NO の指令 無視返せそりゃ
subtitles.english: No, no, no orders, just ignore them and give them back!

subtitles.original: 受け取り拒否れるぞ！
subtitles.english: You can refuse to accept them!

subtitles.original: なんだ意外な
subtitles.english: What a surprise!

subtitles.original: たっちゃんごー
subtitles.english: Tatchan-go!

subtitles.original: ぴゅんだプロペラ回せ
subtitles.english: Zooming, spin the propeller!

subtitles.original: どこへ向かうか知らない
subtitles.english: I don't know where it's going!

subtitles.original: 知らないんだ
subtitles.english: I really don't know!

subtitles.original: なんと世界は繋がっちゃ
subtitles.english: Somehow the world gets connected!

subtitles.original: きょいとどこかへ銀河系
subtitles.english: And zoom, off somewhere into the galaxy!

subtitles.original: 誰に会いたいって思うんだ
subtitles.english: Who do you want to meet?

subtitles.original: そんなのどうでも
subtitles.english: That doesn't really matter...

subtitles.original: いいじゃいじゃん
subtitles.english: Isn't that just fine?

subtitles.original: 退屈イヤだったら
subtitles.english: If you're bored and hate it...

subtitles.original: こっち来れば？
subtitles.english: ...why not come over here?

subtitles.original: 大事な場所なんてさ
subtitles.english: An important place...

subtitles.original: 自分で作らなくちゃ
subtitles.english: ...you have to make it yourself.

subtitles.original: これぞ
subtitles.english: This is it!

subtitles.original: ぺきょだ どだ どだ どだ
subtitles.english: It's Pekyo! How is it, how is it, how is it!

subtitles.original: ありがた迷惑か？
subtitles.english: Is it an unwelcome favor?

subtitles.original: らんだむぶれいんびっくりだわおっ
subtitles.english: Random Brain, what a surprise, wow!

subtitles.original: 生きてりゃ 毎日大変
subtitles.english: As long as you're alive, every day is a struggle!

subtitles.original: 大問題のあとには
subtitles.english: After a big problem...

subtitles.original: 楽しいことあるから
subtitles.english: ...something fun will happen!

subtitles.original: らんだむぶれいんわおっ
subtitles.english: Random Brain, wow!

subtitles.original: 叫んじゃえわおっ
subtitles.english: Let's scream it out, wow!

subtitles.original: 事件だ
subtitles.english: It's an incident!

subtitles.original: 毎日大変
subtitles.english: Every day is a struggle!

subtitles.original: 大成功のタネだと
subtitles.english: As the seeds of great success...

subtitles.original: 笑えない 泣いちゃうな 笑え！
subtitles.english: Can't laugh, don't cry, just laugh!

subtitles.original: ぺこらっ ぷにんぷにんぷにんと
subtitles.english: Pekora, punin punin punin...

subtitles.original: ぺこっ ぺんっ だむしちゃえだまえ
subtitles.english: Peko, pen, damushichae-damae

subtitles.original: NO NO NO の指令 無視返せそりゃ
subtitles.english: No, no, no orders, just ignore them and give them back!

subtitles.original: NO NO NO の指令 らんだむだ Random! Random!
subtitles.english: No, no, no orders, it's random! Random! Random!

subtitles.original: NO NO NO の指令 無視返せそりゃ
subtitles.english: No, no, no orders, just ignore them and give them back!

subtitles.original: 受け取り拒否れるぞ！
subtitles.english: You can refuse to accept them!

subtitles.original: どっちが好きなのよ
subtitles.english: Which one do you like?

subtitles.original:
いいわけバニー
作詞 見里 瑞樹 作曲 ナナホシ管弦楽団
subtitles.english:
Iiwake Bunny
Lyrics: Mizuki Misato, Music: Nanahoshi Orchestra

subtitles.original: なんとか ならないかな
subtitles.english: Can't something be done about this?

subtitles.original: 隣のアイツが邪魔だなぁ
subtitles.english: The guy next to me is such a nuisance.

subtitles.original: 先制必勝！絶対！
subtitles.english: Win by striking first! Absolutely!

subtitles.original: とわとわ 違うな なんだって競争
subtitles.english: Towa-towa, that's not it, everything's a competition.

subtitles.original: 苦手だ そういうの
subtitles.english: I'm not good at that kind of thing.

subtitles.original: なんだか 寂しい気持ちは ちまちま
subtitles.english: Somehow, these lonely feelings are small.

subtitles.original: LET ME SHOW！ しーくれっと
subtitles.english: LET ME SHOW! Secret!

subtitles.original: あの子に負けない気分だってジェラシー
subtitles.english: I won't lose to that girl, even if I feel jealous.

subtitles.original: 言わなくたって わかってる
subtitles.english: I know, even without being told.

subtitles.original: あーでもない こーでもない やめにしましょう
subtitles.english: Let's stop with the 'not this, not that' already.

subtitles.original: 貫け MY MY MY
subtitles.english: Push through, MY MY MY!

subtitles.original: 聞きたくない！いいわけバニー
subtitles.english: I don't want to hear it! Iiwake Bunny!

subtitles.original: 地団駄 勇往邁進 だんだん
subtitles.english: Stamping feet, pushing forward step by step!

subtitles.original: バニバニ だりだり マジな話
subtitles.english: Bunny-bunny, dari-dari, seriously speaking...

subtitles.original: どっちが好きなのよ
subtitles.english: Which one do you like?

subtitles.original: よそ見しないで
subtitles.english: Don't look away!

subtitles.original: 逃げ出したいのは私のほう
subtitles.english: The one who wants to run away is me!

subtitles.original: 通しません！反対方向
subtitles.english: No passing! Go the other way!

subtitles.original: WANTED！いいわけバニー
subtitles.english: WANTED! Iiwake Bunny!

subtitles.original: 旅立とう冒険、
subtitles.english: Let's set out on an adventure,

subtitles.original: そしてインドアの神話へ
subtitles.english: and towards an indoor myth.

subtitles.original:
ララララビット！！
作詞・作曲 チュタン星人
subtitles.english:
Ra-Ra-Ra-Rabbit!!
Lyrics & Music: Chutan-seijin

subtitles.original: 三色パンのスライムにビビるのが大概のマイライフ
subtitles.english: Being scared of three-colored bread slimes is mostly my life.

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 で繋がった世界に愛が溢れ出す
subtitles.english: Love overflows into a world connected by 1, 2, 3!

subtitles.original: 8ビットに感じるドキドキ 次のラブじゃダメですか？
subtitles.english: My heart thumps in 8-bit, is the next 'love' no good?

subtitles.original: 運ゲー状態 ふざけんじゃないわ レベルアップして超えてやるわ
subtitles.english: It's a game of luck, don't mess with me! I'll level up and overcome it!

subtitles.original: 夢に見てるファンファーレの音
subtitles.english: The sound of the fanfare I've dreamed of!

subtitles.original: 離陸して 彗星 彗星 ぶっ飛ばそう 手紙もロマンスの過程
subtitles.english: Take off! Comet, comet, blast off! Even letters are part of the romance process.

subtitles.original: 何万回 小さなビットに でっかい愛を更新中
subtitles.english: Tens of thousands of times, updating huge love into tiny bits.

subtitles.original: ちょっと沼っても許してね？ いつだって愛は非効率
subtitles.english: Forgive me if I get a bit stuck? Love is always inefficient.

subtitles.original: Jumping! Jumping! 跳ねるハートを捕まえておいてね
subtitles.english: Jumping! Jumping! Make sure to catch my bouncing heart!

subtitles.original: 二兎なんて追わないで エンドになるぺこ
subtitles.english: Don't chase two hares, or it'll be the end-peko!
